website_summaries.verdict: Choose this model if you want a hot tub designed for outdoor use that can fit up to 6 users at a time.
pros: An outdoor model with seating for 6 people
Makes a great addition to a deck or patio
Has 34 jets with turbo jet function in 2 seats for maximum muscle relaxation
cons: May add $40 or more to your electric bill, especially if used throughout cooler months

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Update from 2019. Heater went bad. I will tell you. DO NOT TAKE COVERS OFF FROM HEATER AND PUMP SIDE. Corner peice falls out. IF you want it to look good you will get frustrated. I dare you to remove. Do not purchase. Spend more and go to Hot Springs. This is the worst HOT TUBE. I have ever purchase. It is for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not fully functional at 120V
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to heat up on 120 and there is absolutely no insulation inside of the cabinet. Also, you can’t run the jets without the heater turning off. The company should not advertise this as a 120V because it doesn’t have full functionality as a 120V hot tub. I wish I had just bought a 220V tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, poor quality and poor customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The tub and cover was damaged when it arrived, once in place, the control panel was faulty, no way to see which function or temperature it was set to, called customer support, they said they'd send the parts and a service person, that was a week ago and still no parts, and no repair, not that you should need repair on a new hot tub, I'm weighing my options, I'll give them another day then I'll file a complaint with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The hot tub has been fantastic thus far, we have had it since July and it’s been a backyard game changer. No issues with the Midwest rains or cold water so far. We stuck with the 110V and did not change it up to the 220V. You might loose a degree every 30mins. Not a big deal. The delivery process was super easy and the gentlemen was very nice and easy with setting it on my drive. I then had 5 friends come help me lift it into place. Very easy and SHIPPING was FREE! Amazon Prime... gotta love it. Thanks Hudson Bay
customer_reviews.author: John & Anita M

customer_reviews.title: We have enjoyed our Spa
customer_reviews.text: We, Linda and I spent our first summer in Arizona where the day time temperature can reach 120 Degrees. We received the Spa in May and had a concrete slab pored for it. A week later we had the Spa set in place, filled and operating with no problems. We set the water temperature at 90 Degrees. With the air temperature at 110-120 Degrees, the Spa water felt wonderful So this is our Cold Tub Story. I would and do recommend your Hudson Bay Spa to All. James Owens a Grateful Owner
customer_reviews.author: James Owens

customer_reviews.title: We love how we made our home a vacation home
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub is amazing! So much nicer than any tub I've ever been in at rented cabins and hotels. It's large, feels luxury, and we are very happy with this tub. Had ours for maybe 9 months now. Will update if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: dep

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new hot tub! We use it all the time, it's big enough for us and our 3 kids (you can really comfortably fit 5-6 adults in it). It heats up fairly quickly, the jets feel great and overall it was a great purchase we are very happy with! We wrapped it in stone to match the coping around our pool, so it also looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Eubank

customer_reviews.title: Every one from the factory people to Amazon were very communicative.
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking at Hot Tube for over a year and found that the Hudson Bay was the best buy. All the people evolved from the factory to Amazon were very helpful and communicated with us a lot informing us of our order status. The ease of installation was so simple. We enjoy our hot tub every day, the best investment we have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: R. David Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order . Great value . Works perfectly . Easy to use. Delivery was smoothly coordinated .
customer_reviews.author: S. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hot tub and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hot tub. Just enough jets and super easy to set up. The only I would’ve liked is another headrest.
customer_reviews.author: janetm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The spa is great. Our family loves it. It is well worth the money. We live in Texas and the 110v option gets very hot. We would recommend this spa to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt62983

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, trouble free operation. Easy to set up and get running. We would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Don L

customer_reviews.title: Great Hottub
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this hot tub! It was a lot bigger than expected but it works since my husand is 5' 4".
customer_reviews.author: RRJ6770

product_meta.title: Hudson Bay Spa XP34 6 Person 34 Outdoor Spa with Stainless Jets & 110V Cord, 80" x 80" x 34", Sterling White
product_meta.description: Start your own backyard paradise today with home & garden spas. Packed high end features & an economical price in mind. Standard features include beautiful stainless steel jets,7 color LED mood lighting, & a variety of therapeutic jets designed to touch all areas of the body with comfort in mind. Home & garden spas also feature maintenance free synthetic cabinetry, pressure treated base frame along with abs bottom to ensure durability for years to come.
feature_bullets: This item will be delivered curbside. To have the item delivered to a location of choice on your property, kindly make additional arrangements with a third party provider ahead of delivery
Electrical: dedicated 110V/20Amp. 10ft long GFCI cord included. Plugs into standard 110V outlet
(1) energy rite pump- low energy consumption- high performance
12 LED perimeter lights and (1) LED underwater mood light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
